welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Carteret, the charming coastal town known for its beautiful beaches and vibrant community. We hope you have a wonderful stay and take the time to explore and experience all that our city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, primarily used by domestic airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, primarily used by international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, used by major airlines such as United and JetBlue.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Municipal Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: This terminal primarily services domestic flights for American Airlines and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: This terminal primarily services domestic flights for Delta Air Lines and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: This terminal primarily services domestic and international flights for JetBlue Airways and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: This terminal primarily services domestic and international flights for United Airlines and its partners.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, no password required.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: Serves international airlines such as Air France, Japan Airlines, and Lufthansa.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Serves Delta Air Lines and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The largest terminal at JFK, serving a variety of international and domestic airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: Serves JetBlue Airways and its partners.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: Serves British Airways, Alaska Airlines, and other international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: Serves American Airlines and its partners.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Monmouth Executive Airport offers a variety of amenities for travelers, including a comfortable waiting area, a restaurant, and rental car services.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.
